Home/About Us/Pandey S. & Associates

Pandey S. & Associates

ICAN Registered Firm No. 1348 ‚Äî Partner-led Statutory Assurance & Tax Practice

Pandey S. & Associates is a distinguished Chartered Accountant firm registered with the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nepal (ICAN Firm No. 1348), serving as a pillar of professional reliability and ethical clarity within the Nepalese financial landscape. Under the strategic leadership of CA Susmita Pandey (Membership No. 2269; COP No. 1514), the firm harmonizes decades of technical mastery with a steadfast commitment to transparency and meticulous oversight.

Unlike conventional compliance-focused practices, our firm emphasizes a partner-led approach, ensuring every client benefits from direct access to veteran expertise and bespoke financial strategies. By maintaining a sharp focus on regulatory excellence and operational integrity, we serve as a dependable cornerstone for organizations seeking to fortify their financial health and navigate the complexities of modern commerce with professional poise.

‚öñÔ∏è Core Practice Areas ‚Äã

Statutory Auditing

Comprehensive statutory audits ensuring compliance with Nepalese laws and standards including NSA and NFRS.

  • Financial statement audits
  • Special purpose and forensic audits
  • Compliance audits under Companies Act, 2063
  • Donor-funded project audits (NGO/INGO)

Tax Litigation and Representation

Expert representation before the Inland Revenue Department (IRD), Revenue Tribunal, and Administrative Court.

  • Tax assessment appeals
  • VAT and Excise litigation
  • Tax compliance advisory
  • NFRS first-time adoption guidance

Corporate Governance

Advising boards on governance frameworks, internal controls, and regulatory compliance.

  • Board advisory and risk management
  • Internal control assessments
  • Regulatory compliance frameworks
  • SOP development and process standardization

üë§ Proprietor ‚Äî CA Susmita Pandey (Managing Director) ‚Äã

CA Susmita Pandey holds a Certificate of Practice from ICAN (Membership No. 2269; COP No. 1514) and an MBS degree. As the Managing Director, she brings a robust blend of academic leadership and hands-on industry experience in law, taxation, auditing, and financial consultancy.

CA Susmita Pandey ‚Äî Managing Director

Professional Auditing Experience ‚Äã

  • Public Sector and Development: Successfully led audits for over 2,000 entities, including government schools, community forest user groups, Khanepani Sansthan, colleges, and not-for-profit organizations.
  • Financial Institutions: Serves as the Lead Auditor for internal and external audits of prominent Saving and Credit Cooperative Institutions.
  • Corporate and International: Extensive experience conducting statutory and internal audits for INGOs, multinational corporations, and insurance companies.
  • Advisory: Specialized in tax compliance and guiding organizations through the first-time adoption and implementation of Nepal Financial Reporting Standards (NFRS).

Training and Mentorship ‚Äã

  • Government and School Sector: Trained Principals, Accountants, and Bidhyalaya Bewasthapan Samiti members of Kawasothi Municipality on Accounting, Taxation, and Public Procurement Policy.
  • Cooperative Sector: Conducted specialized training on TDS and Income Tax Returns for managers and employees of various cooperatives.
  • Corporate Training: Facilitated financial literacy and tax consultancy programs, including engagements with the Udhyog Banijya Sangh, Baglung.
  • Academia: Served as Faculty member at Gurukul CA (Law), AIIMS ACCA (Law), and Presidency College (Taxation and Auditing).
